CHAT.comment: CITY OF ONTARIO, CALIFORNIA, ET AL., Petitioners v. JEFF QUON, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:06 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF KENT L. RICHLAND ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF NEAL K. KATYAL, ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF DIETER DAMMEIER ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF KENT L. RICHARDS ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 12:08 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
